title: LF 2 Players (Top and ADC) We have won 4 in a row
body:
looking for a gold-plat adc
looking for a high silver-plat top laner.

replies.body:
why delete my post?
I was the adc In this team, he's seeking gold and plat but himself is silver 3 with bronze in the team.
the top and I both left as he is a very bad support. so best of luck to the adc.
This guy he is no better I ask to join his team and without playing a game he just declines me because I was 1 rank below what was "required" This guy doesn't deserve a good team.
That's basically a decent chunk of the teams that recruit on boards described in a nutshell.
Hi i am looking For a team, my elo is not that good but i am wanting to join one!
